trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can cycle through a set of states and maintain a state once set.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un controllo che può scorrere un insieme di stati e gestire che uno stato impostato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] i valori delle proprietà per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: I valori delle proprietà memorizzati nella cache devono essere richiesti in precedenza utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A>per ottenere il valore corrente di una proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sulle proprietà disponibili e il relativo utilizzo, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Una struttura contenente memorizzato nella cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] i valori delle proprietà per il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà richiesta non è presente nella cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto corrente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] i valori delle proprietà per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Questo modello deve provenire da un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>con un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>riferimento per ottenere i valori correnti.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>ottenuto usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, contiene solo dati memorizzati nella cache e il tentativo di ottenere il valore corrente di qualsiasi proprietà genera un'eccezione.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A>per ottenere il valore memorizzato nella cache di una proprietà che è stato precedentemente specificato utilizzando un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sulle proprietà disponibili e il relativo utilizzo, vedere <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Struttura che contiene l'oggetto corrente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] i valori delle proprietà per il pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"> </xref> pattern di controllo.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore del pattern viene passata ai metodi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>per recuperare il pattern di controllo di interesse da specificata <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the toggle states of an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Scorre gli stati di attivazione/disattivazione di un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A control will cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> and, if supported, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo deve scorrere relativo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>in questo ordine: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>e, se supportato, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState*>property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState*>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Questo identificatore viene usato dalle applicazioni client di automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provider di automazione interfaccia utente devono utilizzare il campo equivalente in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> and, if supported, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>deve scorrere i relativi <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>in questo ordine: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>e, se supportato, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
